summary: Implements ONNX‑based pipelines for Stable Diffusion that convert textual prompts into images, covering model loading, input validation, prompt tokenization, preprocessing, scheduler handling, inference execution, and post‑processing of generated images.
business_intent: Provide a high‑performance, hardware‑agnostic solution for deploying Stable Diffusion text‑to‑image generation in production environments, reducing latency and resource usage through ONNX runtime.
